```{python}
#| output: asis
df = pd.DataFrame({
  'var':['a']*10+['b']*3,
  'value':list(range(0,10))+list(range(0,3))
})

for i in ['a','b']:
    display(Markdown(f"## {i}"))
    display(Markdown("::: {.cell tbl-cap='"+i+"'}\n"))
    display(Markdown("::: {.cell label='tbl-"+i+"'}\n"))
    display(great_tables.GT(df.query('var==@i')))
    display(Markdown(":::\n"))
    display(Markdown(":::\n"))
```
